attributes.action: save our Golf clubs Western Park and Humberstone Heights
attributes.additional_details: Leicester City Council are proposing to close the only two pay and play municipal golf courses in Leicester.  These courses support a large number of the general public for exercise, rambling and animal walking to name just a few.  the course also has green belt and the great created newt.  we call on the government to stop the closure of these courses.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council, though perhaps lobby your local MP about this?
